post.summary: Inserts metadata about a new application.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identification of the application to be added. Format: '{org}/{app}'

requestBody.description: The application metadata object to store.

get.summary: Get all applications deployed by a given application owner.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The id of the application owner.

get.summary: Get the metadata for a spesific application based on the given application identifiers.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the organisation responsible for the app.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Application identifier which is unique within an organisation.

put.summary: Updates application metadata for a given application.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The id of theowner of the application to update.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: The name of the application.

requestBody.description: The application metadata object to store.

delete.summary: Delete an application metadata object. Applications will not be deleted, but will be marked as deleted.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the organisation responsible for the app.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Application identifier which is unique within an organisation.

parameters.name: hard
parameters.description: Controls whether the application should be deleted permanently.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to delete.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: A boolean to indicate if the delete should be immediate or delayed following Altinn's business logic

get.summary: Gets a data file from storage. The content type is the same as the file was stored with.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to retrieve.

put.summary: Replaces an existing data element with the attached file. The StreamContent.Headers.ContentDisposition.FileName property shall be used to set the filename on client side

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to replace.

parameters.name: refs
parameters.description: An optional array of data element references.

parameters.name: generatedFromTask
parameters.description: An optional id of the task the data element was generated from

get.summary: Returns a list of data elements of an instance.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

post.summary: Create and save the data element. The StreamContent.Headers.ContentDisposition.FileName property shall be used to set the filename on client side

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataType
parameters.description: The data type identifier for the data being uploaded.

parameters.name: refs
parameters.description: An optional array of data element references.

parameters.name: generatedFromTask
parameters.description: An optional id of the task the data element was generated from

put.summary: Replaces the existing metadata for a data element with the new data element.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to update.

requestBody.description: The new metadata for the data element.

put.summary: Sets the file scan status for an existing data element.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to update.

requestBody.description: The file scan results for this data element.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to delete.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the data element is associated with.

parameters.name: dataGuid
parameters.description: The id of the data element to delete.

post.summary: Inserts new instance event into the instanceEvent collection.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the event is associated with.

requestBody.description: The instance event object to be inserted

get.summary: Retrieves all instance events related to given instance id, listed event types, and given time frame from instanceEvent collection.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the event(s) is associated with.

parameters.name: eventTypes
parameters.description: Array of event types to filter the events by.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Lower bound for DateTime span to filter events by.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Upper bound for DateTime span to filter events by.

get.summary: Get information about one specific event.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that the event is associated with.

parameters.name: eventGuid
parameters.description: The unique id of the specific event to retrieve.

get.summary: Get all instances that match the given query parameters. Parameters can be combined. Unknown or illegal parameter values will result in 400 - bad request.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: application owner.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: application id.

parameters.name: process.currentTask
parameters.description: Running process current task id.

parameters.name: process.isComplete
parameters.description: Is process complete.

parameters.name: process.endEvent
parameters.description: Process end state.

parameters.name: process.ended
parameters.description: Process ended value.

parameters.name: instanceOwner.partyId
parameters.description: Instance owner id.

parameters.name: lastChanged
parameters.description: Last changed date.

parameters.name: created
parameters.description: Created time.

parameters.name: visibleAfter
parameters.description: The visible after date time.

parameters.name: dueBefore
parameters.description: The due before date time.

parameters.name: excludeConfirmedBy
parameters.description: A string that will hide instances already confirmed by stakeholder.

parameters.name: status.isSoftDeleted
parameters.description: Is the instance soft deleted.

parameters.name: status.isHardDeleted
parameters.description: Is the instance hard deleted.

parameters.name: status.isArchived
parameters.description: Is the instance archived.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The page size.

post.summary: Inserts new instance into the instance collection.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: the application id

get.summary: Gets a specific instance with the given instance id.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to retrieve.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that should be deleted.

parameters.name: hard
parameters.description: if true hard delete will take place. if false, the instance gets its status.softDelete attribute set to current date and time.

post.description:
Add to an instance that a given stakeholder considers the instance as no longer needed by them. The stakeholder has
collected all the data and information they needed from the instance and expect no additional data to be added to it.
The body of the request isn't used for anything despite this being a POST operation.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to confirm as complete.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to confirm as complete.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The updated read status.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to confirm as complete.

put.summary: Updates the presentation texts on an instance

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to confirm as complete.

requestBody.description: Collection of changes to the presentation texts collection.

put.summary: Updates the data values on an instance.

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: The party id of the instance owner.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance to confirm as complete.

requestBody.description: Collection of changes to the presentation texts collection.

post.summary: Search through instances to find match based on query params.

parameters.description: the instance owner id

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: the instance guid

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: language id en, nb, nn-NO"

parameters.description: instance id

parameters.name: instanceOwnerPartyId
parameters.description: instance owner

parameters.description: if true is marked for hard delete.

get.summary: Gets all instances in a given state for a given instance owner.

parameters.description: instance owner

parameters.description: instance id

put.summary: Updates the process of an instance.

parameters.name: instanceGuid
parameters.description: The id of the instance that should have its process updated.

requestBody.description: The new process state of the instance.

get.summary: Get the process history for an instance.

parameters.description: The id of the instance whos process history to retrieve.

requestBody.description: Signrequest containing data element ids and sign status

count.description: The number of items in this response.

next.description: A link to the next page.

instanceOwnerPartyIdList.description: List of instance owner party id(s)

includeActive.description: Boolean indicating whether to include active instances.

includeArchived.description: Boolean indicating whether to include archived instances.

includeDeleted.description: Boolean indicating whether to include deleted instances.

fromLastChanged.description: Gets or sets the from last changed date.

toLastChanged.description: Gets or sets the to last changed date.

fromCreated.description: Gets or sets the from created time.

toCreated.description: Gets or sets the to created time.

MessageBoxQueryModel.description: Represents queryparams for search from messagebox.

JwtCookie.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}". Remember to add "Bearer" to the input below before your token.
JwtCookie.name: Authorization
